channel.title: [PI] Setting an timer to an Object! [Easy]

item.title: [PI] Setting an timer to an Object! [Easy]
item.dc:creator: @IamGretar IamGretar
item.description:
@IamGretar wrote:

case 4156: //Mini Game Portal c.minigamePortal = System.currentTimeMillis(); if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.minigamePortal >= 3000) c.getPA().movePlayer(3087, 3497, 0); break;

So this is my code. I need to make it so after they click the portal nothing happens but when they click the Portal the timer starts and after 30 seconds they can click it!

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Setting an timer to an Object! [Easy]
